Licensing:

#CC0 1.0 Universal License Text

According to the Creative Commons website the CC0 1.0 Universal license text is dedicated to the Public Domain under the CC0.

References: 
- The webpage "https://creativecommons.org/terms/" (as viewed on January 25, 2023) includes the statement, "CC-Owned Content: Other than the text of Creative Commons licenses, CC0 [...] (all of which are made available under the CC0 Public Domain Dedication)".
